comments:
I have a Shell in gridlayout, and a Tree on it. When i select the Tree and click
on the Customize layout menubar action, it throws exceptions and doesnt launch
the dialog.

Closing all editors and reopening VE fixes the problem.


java.lang.NullPointerException

Found out a reproduceable secario:
Close all editors in workbench. Open a file in VE and check that the customize
layout dialog launches properly. Now by using the 'history' arrow action open a
file in Java editor (this will make the customize layout action go away). Now
select the VE editor and try to launch the customize layout dialog away and the
NPE occurs.

The stack trace of the customize layout action being disposed is:
